thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Paul George
thread.title_full: Reid Cycles reviewed by Paul George

author: Paul George
title: Paul George
text:
My bike was delivered on time. I'm more than happy with the quality of my new bike (my first new bike in 40 years! And yes, I still have the old bike.)
I took the advice written in large letters on the packaging and had the bike professionally assembled.
I had a query about a promotion that wasn't applied to my purchase. I was treated with courtesy, and the error was fixed immediately.
